attributes.action: Please welcome President Donald Trump to attend State Visit with HRH The Queen
attributes.additional_details:
Just click on the :- Get petition date (json format)  which is always located towards the bottom of the petition page, under the creators name, and date created. There you will see the names of the people signing the petition. 
All signatories must be British citizens to be entitled to sign any petition on this official Government site. You will see that too many signatures on the petition that opposes President Donald Trump's State visit with our Queen originate from abroad.
attributes.background: This is to oppose the petition which is being filled with, Bot Software generated, foreign and fraudulent signatures, and is attempting to prevent the new 45th US President from attending a State Visit with our Monarch HRH The Queen, as invited by Prime Minister Theresa May MP.
